description:
This feature includes registering, Modifying and Approval of Business Admin and
    Customer Support Admin Users by System Admin
name: User Management : Administrator/Business/Subscriber

steps.name: Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker
Navigate to User Management and Click on register
Select User type as Adminstrator and click on BusinessAdmin
Enter all the required details
Confirmation message is displayed

result.error_message:
AssertionError: Timed out retrying after 15000ms: expected '[ <h2.text-center.text-danger>, 1 more... ]' to have text ' SUCCESS Service is successfully paused. Kindly contact admin for approval', but the text was ' ERROR Error occurred'
    + expected - actual

    -' ERROR Error occurred'
    +' SUCCESS Service is successfully paused. Kindly contact admin for approval'

    at Context.eval (http://125.16.139.20:8023/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\BDD\CreationOfUsers\Users.feature:239:38)
    at Context.resolveAndRunStepDefinition (http://125.16.139.20:8023/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\BDD\CreationOfUsers\Users.feature:15362:29)
    at Context.eval (http://125.16.139.20:8023/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\BDD\CreationOfUsers\Users.feature:14683:35)

steps.name: Navigate to My Activity and Aplly required filters
Assert Created Business Admin Mobile Number and Write Created on time
Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Checker1
Navigate to Approvals and filter by Submitted status
User click on submitted user data
Approve the Users

result.error_message:

    at Context.eval (http://125.16.139.20:8023/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\BDD\CreationOfUsers\Users.feature:307:16)

    at Context.eval (http://125.16.139.20:8023/__cypress/tests?p=cypress\integration\BDD\CreationOfUsers\Users.feature:14683:35)

steps.name: User status is approved
Logout
Login into Mobiquity Portal as System admin Maker after Logout
Navigate to Manage User, and search Business Admin
Assert Created Business Admin Mobile Number

elements.name: To verify that valid System admin/Business Admin is able to initiate businsess user creation.
